title: ITP – a first for traveller security in Nigeria
text:
ITP – a first for traveller security in Nigeria ITP – a first for traveller security in Nigeria Details Category: Agency & Association   11:00 ITP - International Travel Partnership’s TMC partner in Nigeria, PassageGold Travel, has recently implemented Amadeus Mobile Messenger, part of the ITP TravelSafe risk management solution. “We are very pleased to be the first TMC in Nigeria to provide our clients with a risk management solution”, said George Anyanwu, PassageGold’s Marketing Director. 
“It is reassuring for our travellers to know that we are monitoring and tracking world events with instant notification anywhere in the world that could be potentially disruptive or even affect their personal security”. Virginia Palla, ITP’s General Manager, said, “Traveller security has always been a high priority and corporate clients are always looking for ways to provide support for their employees when away on business. Mobile Messenger is an effective way of doing this”. Amadeus Mobile Messenger provides professional assistance for handling disruptive events such as weather events, political unrest or natural disasters, and allows two-way communication with travellers at any time. This ensures the agent/travel manager is always in complete control of the situation and provides peace of mind to travellers. Related articles
